infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
Look at you, bigshot, walking into a canteen like it isn't some huge deal.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: laundry place
infos.desc:
You arrive in an ordinary kind of place. That is to say, you're in a laundry place.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You're now in the cubicle.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a workshop. An ordinary one.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
Well I'll be, you are in a place we're calling a dish-pit.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You've walked into an usual room. Your mind races to think of what kind of room would be usual. And then it hits you. Of course. You're in the cookhouse.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: coin
infos.desc: The coin looks well matched to everything else here

objective: Welcome to another fast paced episode of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First of all, make an effort to head north. With that over with, make an effort to go east. And then, go to the east. Okay, and then, attempt to travel north. And then, try to head north. And then, pick up the coin from the floor of the cookhouse. Alright, thanks!
